FortuneOxPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFortuneOxFeature1: During any spin, the Fortune Ox Feature may be randomly triggered while the reels are spinning.
FortuneOxPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyFortuneOxFeature2: During the Fortune Ox Feature, the first and third reel will share the same symbols, and all reels will respin until there is a win.
FortuneOxPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyTenTimesMultiplier1: When one symbol (and/or Wild symbol) occupies all of the reel positions, the win will be multiplied by x10.
FortuneOxPayoutAndRulesShared.BodyTenTimesMultiplier2: Stand a chance to win up to 2000x of the total bet amount.

FortuneOxRules.GeneralRules1: Fortune Ox is a 3-reel, 3-row (for reel 1 and 3) and 4-row (for reel 2) video slot featuring respins until win and x10 multiplier.

GeneralRules2.value: The game is played with 10 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
GeneralRules2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be minimum bet level, maximum max level, minimum bet size and maximum bet size in numeric form.
GeneralRules2.example: The game is played with 10 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.05 to 50.
